diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BC$ is $y$ units.
The measure of angle $BCA$ is $60$ degrees.
The length of the line $AC$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $12$ units.
The lines $AC$ and $AB$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
